#summary buttonTo([disable,source,text,confirm,route,controller,action,key,params,anchor,onlyPath,host,protocol,port])
#labels api,1.0

*Category*:

[ViewHelperFunctions View Helper Functions]

*Description*:

Creates a form containing a single button that submits to the URL. The URL is built the same way as the `linkTo` function.

*Return Type*:

String

*History*:

-

*Parameters*:

||   || *Type* || *Required* || *Default* || *Description* ||
|| *disable* || boolean or string || false ||   || Pass in `true` if you want the button to be disabled when clicked (can help prevent multiple clicks) or pass in a string if you want the button disabled and the text on the button updated (to 'please wait...' for example) ||
|| *source* || string || false ||   || If you want to use an image for the button pass in the link to it here (relative from the `images` folder) ||
|| *text* || string || false ||   || See documentation for `linkTo` ||
|| *confirm* || string || false ||   || See documentation for `linkTo` ||
|| *route* || string || false ||   || See documentation for `URLFor` ||
|| *controller* || string || false ||   || See documentation for `URLFor` ||
|| *action* || string || false ||   || See documentation for `URLFor` ||
|| *key* || string, list or number || false ||   || See documentation for `URLFor` ||
|| *params* || string || false ||   || See documentation for `URLFor` ||
|| *anchor* || string || false ||   || See documentation for `URLFor` ||
|| *onlyPath* || boolean || false || true || See documentation for `URLFor` ||
|| *host* || string || false ||   || See documentation for `URLFor` ||
|| *protocol* || string || false ||   || See documentation for `URLFor` ||
|| *port* || number || false ||   || See documentation for `URLFor` ||

*Examples*:

{{{
#buttonTo(text="Delete Account", action="perFormDelete", disabled="Wait...")#
}}}

*Related*:

 * [LinkingPages LinkingPages] (chapter)
 * [linkTo linkTo()] (function)
 * [URLFor URLFor()] (function)
